translation: 在与[From.From.GetName]的边境导演一场边境摩擦

original: §WMaintain divisions in §H[From.From.GetName]§!\n§H[From.GetNameDef]§! can escalate to a §HBorder Conflict§!§!.
translation: §W维持军队于§H[From.From.GetName]§!\n§H[From.GetNameDef]§!可以升级为一场§H边境冲突§!§!。

original: §H[From.GetNameDef]§! can escalate incident to a §HBorder Conflict§!.\nWe will instantly lose if we have no divisions in the state\n
translation: §H[From.GetNameDef]§!可以将事件升级为§H边境冲突§!。\n如果我们在边境上没有军队我们将马上失败\n

original: §H[From.GetNameDef]§! can no longer escalate to a §HBorder Conflict§!.\n\n
translation: §H[From.GetNameDef]§!已经不能升级为§H边境冲突了§!。\n\n
与[From.GetName]的摩擦升级为边境冲突
与[From.From.GetName]的边境摩擦已被遗忘

original: Cannot stage a new incident against §H[From.GetName]§! for §H120§! days.\n
translation: 不能在§H120§!天内向§H[From.GetName]§!发起边境摩擦。\n

original: Cannot stage a new incident against §H[From.GetName]§! for §H180§! days.\n
translation: 不能在§H180§!天内向§H[From.GetName]§!发起边境摩擦。\n

original: Has not initiated a Border Incident with [From.GetNameDef]
translation: 还没有与[From.GetNameDef]发生边境摩擦

original: Has not initiated a Border Incident with [Root.GetNameDef]
translation: 还没有与[Root.GetNameDef]发生边境摩擦

original: At least §H1§! division in the State
States do not have an active border incident
translation: 省份中没有正在进行的边境冲突

original: The clash in the borderlands between [our_state.GetName] and [their_state.GetName] saw our forces win a clear victory over the forces of [their_country.GetLeader]. The [their_country.GetAdjective] forces have fallen back to regroup, and our forces have taken control of the disputed area.
translation: 在[our_state.GetName]与[their_state.GetName]边境上发生的冲突以我们完胜[their_country.GetLeader]的军队的结局告终。[their_country.GetAdjective]的军队被击退，而我们则占领了争议地区。
我们展示了自己的实力！

original: The clash in the borderlands between [our_state.GetName] and [their_state.GetName] saw our forces win a clear victory over the forces of [their_country.GetLeader]. The [their_country.GetAdjective] forces have fallen back to regroup, and our forces have taken control of the disputed area.
translation: 在[our_state.GetName]与[their_state.GetName]边境上发生的冲突以我们完胜[their_country.GetLeader]的军队的结局告终。[their_country.GetAdjective]的军队被击退，而我们则占领了争议地区。
我们展示了自己的实力！

original: Forces under the command of [their_country.GetLeader] have succeeded in pushing us out of the disputed area between [our_state.GetName] and [their_state.GetName]. Our forces have retreated in good order and are reorganising should we want to renew the battle in the future.
translation: [their_country.GetLeader]麾下的军队将我们的军队驱离了在[our_state.GetName]与[their_state.GetName]之间的争议地区。我们的部队在撤退中保持了良好的纪律并在进行重整以备未来的战斗。

original: We must counterattack as soon as possible!

Forces under the command of [their_country.GetLeader] have succeeded in pushing us out of the disputed area between [our_state.GetName] and [their_state.GetName]. Our forces have retreated in good order and are reorganising should we want to renew the battle in the future.
translation: [their_country.GetLeader]麾下的军队将我们的军队驱离了在[our_state.GetName]与[their_state.GetName]之间的争议地区。我们的部队在撤退中保持了良好的纪律并在进行重整以备未来的战斗。

original: We must counterattack as soon as possible!

The fighting in the [our_state.GetName]-[their_state.GetName] Area has ground to a halt as both sides have proven unable to dislodge the other. Little territory has been gained by either side. Scouts report that the [their_country.GetAdjective] soldiers on the other side are digging in on defensive terrain. It would appear that they intend to keep the territory they have, but probably won't push against our lines.
translation: 由于双方都无法击退对方，在[our_state.GetName]-[their_state.GetName]地区的战斗陷入了僵持。双方都未能取得任何较大的进展。情报人员汇报，[their_country.GetAdjective]的士兵在对方阵地挖掘工事，看起来相比于进攻，他们更想守住现有的防线。

original: The fighting in the [our_state.GetName]-[their_state.GetName] Area has ground to a halt as both sides have proven unable to dislodge the other. Little territory has been gained by either side. Scouts report that the [their_country.GetAdjective] soldiers on the other side are digging in on defensive terrain. It would appear that they intend to keep the territory they have, but probably won't push against our lines.
translation: 由于双方都无法击退对方，在[our_state.GetName]-[their_state.GetName]地区的战斗陷入了僵持。双方都未能取得任何较大的进展。情报人员汇报，[their_country.GetAdjective]的士兵在对方阵地挖掘工事，看起来相比于进攻，他们更想守住现有的防线。

original:
Earlier yesterday, [their_country.GetAdjective] soldiers were spotted crossing the border from [attacker_state.GetName] into [defender_state.GetName]. During the night, more [their_country.GetAdjective] forces have poured into the area and set up defensive positions inside our territory. 

This follows a series of minor skirmishes and border violations by forces under the command of [their_country.GetLeader] all along our shared border.

This time, however, it is clear that the [their_country.GetAdjective] forces are here to stay. We must send forces into the region as soon as possible to check their advance.
translation:
昨日早间，[their_country.GetAdjective]的士兵被发现越过[attacker_state.GetName]边境侵入[defender_state.GetName]。而在晚上，更多的[their_country.GetAdjective]军队开进了这个地区并且在我们的固有领土内设置防线。

随后，[their_country.GetLeader]麾下的军队与我们在整条边境线上发生了一系列的肢体和交火。

至此，情势已经十分明显，[their_country.GetAdjective]的军队将会在此固守。我们必须尽快组织军队以阻止他们的侵略。

original: Scouting reports indicate that [From.GetAdjective] forces are massing inside [their_state.GetName] for a major operation to push deeper into [our_state.GetName]. Given the amount of resources [From.GetLeader] is willing to expend on this adventure, it is clear that this is no longer a mere dispute over the exact location of a demarcation line.\n\nFull scale war is on the horizon.
translation: 情报人员汇报，[From.GetAdjective]的军队正在[their_state.GetName]集结，以期进行更大规模的军事行动来侵入[our_state.GetName]。由[From.GetLeader]调集的物资判断，这场冲突已将不再局限于争议边界。\n\n一场全面战争即将来袭。

original: We must be ready to meet them!
translation: 我们必须做好直面他们的准备！
